1.title: 30 East Drive - Unseen Paranormal Investigation Footage

episode of.title: Ghost Dimension: Unseen and Unedited (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Join Sean, Bex and Paul as they investigated 30 East Drive and watch never seen before footage from this haunted home, believed to be one of the most active homes in the UK.

2.title: Gotts Park Mansion - Unseen Paranormal Investigation Footage

episode of.title: Ghost Dimension: Unseen and Unedited (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Footage from Gotts Park Mansion, never seen before. Sean and Bex investigate the kitchen areas and uncover spooky happenings. The spirits appear to make themselves known.

3.title: Jessops Old Mill and Auction House - Unseen Paranormal Investigation Footage

episode of.title: Ghost Dimension: Unseen and Unedited (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Unseen footage taken from Jessops Auction house. Paul investigates on his own and appears to be in direct contact with multiple ghostly souls.

4.title: Leeds Museum - Unseen Paranormal Investigation Footage

episode of.title: Ghost Dimension: Unseen and Unedited (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Bex and Sean appear in footage never released before from Leeds Museum as they investigate one of the most active parts of the building.

5.title: The Village Farm and Museum - Unseen Paranormal Investigation Footage

episode of.title: Ghost Dimension: Unseen and Unedited (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Bex, Sean and Paul split into vigils to uncover what could be haunting at The Village Farm Museum. Never before seen footage and a full uncut investigation with Paul as he communicates direct with spirit entities.

6.title: The Lord Eldon - Unseen Paranormal Investigation Footage

episode of.title: Ghost Dimension: Unseen and Unedited (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Bex, Sean and Paul feature at The Lord Eldon, believed to be one of the most haunted pubs in Cheshire and communicate directly with spirits. Plenty of knocks from spirits in the pub. Bex and Sean send a negative spirit on its way to the light. Never seen before footage from Ghost Dimension.

7.title: Bolton Sea Cadets - Unseen Paranormal Investigation Footage

episode of.title: Ghost Dimension: Unseen and Unedited (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: Join Bex. Sean and Dave as they conduct as seance at the Sea Cadets building and try to communicate with an angry spirit and Sean completes a lone vigil on his own. This is footage never released before from Ghost Dimension.

8.title: The Old Glen - Unseen Paranormal Investigation Footage

episode of.title: Ghost Dimension: Unseen and Unedited (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Sean, Bex and Paul show never seen before footage of their investigation at The Old Glen and capture spirit stick figures on the SLS camera. Then they venture deep into the woods to seek out the Milner Mansion Curse.

9.title: Northwich Plaza - Unseen Paranormal Investigation Footage

episode of.title: Ghost Dimension: Unseen and Unedited (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: Join, Bex, Sean and Paul in unseen footage at Nottingham's City of Caves. They place protection around them before they come face to face with unknown forces.

10.title: City of Caves - Unseen Paranormal Investigation Footage

episode of.title: Ghost Dimension: Unseen and Unedited (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: Join, Bex, Sean and Paul in unseen footage at Nottingham's City of Caves. They place protection around them before they come face to face with unknown forces.

imdb.title: Ghost Dimension: Unseen and Unedited
akas: Ghost Dimension: Unseen and Unedited (United Kingdom)
plot: Raw and unedited footage taken from paranormal series Ghost Dimension. Never seen before investigation footage from when Sean, Bex and the team head into some of the UK's most haunted locations.
